project_files.description: Master list of all component JSON files in the project. Auto-generated by the validation script.

type_definitions.description: Definitions and rules for each component type.

hdr_content_rules.rule_name: Must define display dimensions and Pixel struct in a namespace

PIN_ASSIGNMENT.description: Defines a dynamic pin assignment bus. Requires 'hardware_type' to determine which pin pool to use.

generates_code.description: This type requires the build system to generate an 'extern' variable based on the 'hardware_type' field.

src_content_rules.rule_name: Must contain init and act function definitions

hdr_content_rules.rule_name: Must contain init and act function prototypes
